synopsis: Reviewers highlight a deep, jetâ€‘black payoff with smooth, oneâ€‘stroke application at a very affordable price. Many describe strong pigmentation and frequent repurchases, often noting good value during sales. Opinions diverge on wear: some report longâ€‘lasting, smudgeâ€‘resistant results, while others see transfer or fading within a few hours, especially on oily lids. Feedback on waterproofness and removal is mixed. A minority mention eye irritation or watery eyes, and a number report receiving broken tips or damaged units.
key_takeaways: Rich jetâ€‘black color with strong pigmentation and easy singleâ€‘stroke coverage
Glides smoothly; many consider it budgetâ€‘friendly and good value on offers
Wear time varies considerably; several users report smudging or quicker fading
Mixed feedback on waterproof claims and removal effort across reviewers

verdict.label: Buy
verdict.reasons: Weighted ratings (verified boosted) blended with sentiment.
